wikipedia_page.main: Karl Turner (born 29 November 1987) is an English cricketer who played for Nottinghamshire. Turner is a left-handed batsman and a right-arm medium-fast bowler. He joined the Academy at Durham in 2004 and played for their Second XI before moving to Nottinghamshire where a score of 185 in a 2011 Second XI Championship match against MCC Universities helped to earn him a place in the First XI.

*Karl Turner (British politician) (born 1971), British Labour Member of Parliament
